Test What we know after MSDR Courses by Processing NOAA Significant Earthquakes dataset

## Installation

You can install MSDRCapstone from github with:

```R
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("MSDRCapstone/askia318")
```

## Example
* It takes raw NOAA data frame and returns a clean data frame.
```R
eq_clean_data
```
